ComicInfo.Summary:
There can be only one... only one all-new, action-packed, monthly comic book series starring the Immortal Highlander!
Our opening story arc comes to a globe-spanning conclusion from writers Michael Avon Oeming and Brandon Jerwa along with artist Lee Moder. As Connor and crew race to destroy the remnants of the Kurgan's super-soldiers in the present, allegiances fall apart and a traitor is revealed!
Featuring another trio of immortal covers from Tony (Conan) Harris, Dave Dorman and this month Billy (Uncanny X-Men) Tan!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Tony Harris | 1 | B | Cover B | Billy Tan | 3 | C | Cover C | Dave Dorman | 2 | RI | Retailer Incentive - Black-and-White Sketch Cover | Tony Harris | Missing | RI | Retailer Incentive - Virgin Art Cover | Dave Dorman | Missing |
